casebody.data:
Ronald HERNDON
v.
LOUISIANA DEPARTMENT OF PUBLIC SAFETY & CORRECTIONS NO. 2017-CI-1185 Supreme Court of Louisiana. October 15, 2018

WRIT NOT CONSIDERED. Petitioner has not demonstrated that he sought review in the court(s) below before filing in this Court nor shown the "extraordinary circumstances" that would justify bypassing *1301that level of review. La.S.Ct.R. X § 5(b).
